snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission said the system was aimed at making it easier for the government to investigate market disruptions.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission approves a rule to require American stock exchanges and other markets to establish a uniform system for tracking all orders and trades; says system is aimed at making it easier for the government to investigate market disruptions.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission said the system was aimed at making it easier for the government to investigate market disruptions.

headline.seo: S.E.C. Approves Rule on Tracking Trades
headline.main: S.E.C. Orders System to Aid Trade Tracking
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Orders System to Aid Trade Tracking
